Jaeyoon Sim

▶︎ Hello, I am a M.S. / Ph.D. integrated graduate student of Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH) where I belong to Graduate School of Artificial Intelligence (GSAI). Also I am a member of Medical Information Processing lab (MIP LAB) at POSTECH under Prof. Won H. Kim. I am interested in and mainly study artificial intelligence, especially computer vision and machine learning fields.

Research Interest

  • Computer Vision
  • Machine Learning
  • Medical Imaging
  • Signal Processing
  • Graph Neural Network
